# About me

I study animal movement ecology, which includes inferring animal
behavioral states, space use, and resource selection from biotelemetry
data collected on both aquatic and terrestrial organisms.

ORISE Postdoctoral Fellow (2023-present) -- USGS EESC

Postdoctoral Research Associate (2019-2021) -- University of Florida
